original_text: Which thing I also did in Jerusalem: and many of the saints did I shut up in prison, having received authority from the chief priests; and when they were put to death, I gave my voice against them.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 이런 일을 행하여 대제사장들에게서 권한을 받아 가지고 많은 성도를 옥에 가두며 또 죽일 때에 내가 찬성 투표를 하였고

sentences.original_text: Which thing I also did in Jerusalem
and many of the saints did I shut up in prison
having received authority from the chief priests
and when they were put to death
I gave my voice against them
